lead_paragraph: Dougie Hamilton wasn't going to change his approach after being held without a goal through Calgary's first eight games. His patience paid off Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Hamilton's 3 Points Leads Flames to 5-2 Win Over Senators
headline.main: Hamilton's 3 Points Leads Flames to 5-2 Win Over Senators
